info.description:
# Introduction

Welcome to the UnificationEngine® WhatsApp API! You can use our API to access UnificationEngine® API endpoints, which can communicate with WhatsApp.
info.title: WhatsApp Sandbox

post.description:
This endpoint will add a connection to the user of the application. A connection is an authenticated instance of a connector. A connector, which has to be added in the developer portal, is a bridge between the service and the application. A service can be anything like WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram etc. The uri parameter part for this api call consists of three parts: * Connector identifier (scheme of uri) * Service access token * Service domain name The "name" parameter is used to identify the connection for the user, which is required for the further api calls using this connection. Once a connection is successfully added, it can be identified by using the "name" as "unified://name". The name should not contain any spaces and slashes. This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user. # Add connection uri details
__The params has to be appended as query string at the end of uri.__ \ While adding a connection, the uri parts like service access token, secret and query parameter values should be encoded in the application. \ The uri parts decoding should be handled in the connector for each api request. \ **The command to add a WhatsApp connection is** curl -XPOST https://apiv2.unificationengine.com/v2/connection/add -u USER_ACCESSKEY:USER_ACCESSSECRET --data '{"uri":"whatsappsandbox://PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE@whatsapp.com","name":"UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER"}' -k
`Remember — the API requires authentication!`

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message

post.description:
This endpoint will send a text message to WhatsApp Services. The contentType in the ‘part' parameter should be one of the connector capabilities, which can be seen when adding the connector to your application. 
\
This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user.
\
The "**type**" available in message parts is body.

Please note that A message can be sent via API, only if the user has communicated to the WhatsApp Business number in the last 24 hours.

A text message can be a maximum of 4096 characters long. The maximum file size for uploaded media is 100MB.
\
To send a new message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", "MESSAGE_BODY" and "MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE" has to be changed.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`
![text](/text.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__MESSAGE_BODY__: The message to be sent
__MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE__: The size of the MESSAGE_BODY
__CONTENT_TYPE__: Supported Content-Types are text/plain and text/html

post.description:
This endpoint will send an  Image to service. The contentType in the ‘part' parameter should be one of the connector capabilities, which can be seen when adding the connector to your application. 
\
This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user.
\
The "**type**" available in message parts is image_link.
Maximum supported image size is 5 MB.
\
The contentType's that are supported by UE are listed below

1. image/jpg
2. image/png

Any contentType  which is not supported by UE will be treated as **binary** and UE will send the contentType as received to the connector.

To send image "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", “CONTENT_TYPE”, "IMAGE_LINK" , "IMAGE_LINK_SIZE" has to be changed.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`
![image](/image.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ : Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__IMAGE_LINK__: The image link to be sent for eg: https://uibai.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/1603517259386
__IMAGE_LINK_SIZE__: The character length of the image link to be sent
__CONTENT_TYPE__: Supported Content-Types are image/jpeg and image/png
__FILE_NAME__: The name to be displayed for the file

post.description:
This endpoint will send an image with text  message to service. The contentType in the ‘part' parameter should be one of the connector capabilities, which can be seen when adding the connector to your application. 
\
This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user.
\
The "**type**" available in message parts is image_link.
Maximum supported image size is 5 MB.
The contentType's that are supported by UE are listed below

1. image/jpg
2. image/png
3. text/plain
4. text/html

To send image "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", “CONTENT_TYPE”, "IMAGE_LINK" , "IMAGE_LINK_SIZE" has to be changed.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`

![text](/imgwithtxt.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ : Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__IMAGE_LINK__: The image link to be sent for eg: https://uibai.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/1603517259386
__IMAGE_LINK_SIZE__: The character length of the image link to be sent
__CONTENT_TYPE__: Supported Content-Types are text/plain, text/html, image/jpeg and image/png
__FILE_NAME__: The name to be displayed for the file
__MESSAGE_BODY__: The message to be sent
__MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE__: The size of the MESSAGE_BODY

post.description:
This endpoint will send a document message to service. \ This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user. Maximum spported size is 100 MB. The "**type**" available in message parts is file. \ To send document "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER",
“CONTENT_TYPE”, "DOCUMENT_LINK" , "DOCUMENT_LINK_SIZE " has to be changed. `Remember — the API requires authentication!` ![document](/doc.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ : Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__DOCUMENT_LINK__: The document link to be sent for eg: http://www.africau.edu/images/default/sample.pdf
__DOCUMENT_LINK_SIZE__: The character length of the document link to be sent
__CONTENT_TYPE__: Supported Content-Types application/pdf, application/msword, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/vnd.ms-excel, text/plain
__FILE_NAME__: The name to be displayed for the file

post.description:
This endpoint will send an audio message to service. 
\
This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user.

Maximum supported size is 16MB.
The "**type**" available in message parts is audio_link.
\
To send audio "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", “CONTENT_TYPE”, "AUDIO_LINK" , "AUDIO_LINK_SIZE" has to be changed.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`

![audio](/audio.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ : Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__AUDIO_LINK__: The audio link to be sent for eg: http://file-examples.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/file_example_MP3_700KB.mp3
__AUDIO_LINK_SIZE__: The character length of the audio link to be sent
__CONTENT_TYPE__: Supported Content-Types audio/acc, audio/mp4, audio/amr, audio/mpeg, audio/ogg; codecs=opus Note: The base audio/ogg type is not supported.
__FILE_NAME__: The name to be displayed for the file

post.description:
This endpoint will send a video message to service. 
\
This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user.
\
The "**type**" available in message parts is video_link.
Maximum supported size is 16 MB.
\
To send audio "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", “CONTENT_TYPE”, "VIDEO_LINK" , "VIDEO_LINK_SIZE" has to be changed.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`

![video](/video.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ : Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__VIDEO_LINK__: The video link to be sent for eg: http://clips.vorwaerts-gmbh.de/big_buck_bunny.mp4
__VIDEO_LINK_SIZE__: The character length of the video link to be sent
__CONTENT_TYPE__: Supported Content-Types video/mp4 Note: Only H.264 video codec and AAC audio codec is supported.
__FILE_NAME__: The name to be displayed for the file

post.description:
This endpoint will send a Link message to service. 
\
This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user.
\
The "**type**" available in message parts is link.
\
To send a new message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", "LINK" and "LINK_SIZE" has to be changed.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`

![link](/link.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ : Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__LINK__: The link to be sent for eg: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C0DPdy98e4c
__LINK_SIZE__: The character length of the link to be sent
__CONTENT_TYPE__: Supported Content-Types is text/plain

post.description:
This endpoint will send a Location message to service. \ This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user. \ The "**type**" available in message parts is location. \ To send a new message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", "LONGITUDE", "LATITUDE", "LOCATION_NAME", "LOCATION_ADDRESS",
and "MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE" has to be changed. `Remember — the API requires authentication!` ![location](/location.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE__: The character length of the data to be sent
__LONGITUDE__: Longitude of the location
__LATITUDE__: Latitude of the location
__LOCATION_NAME__: Name of the location
__LOCATION_ADDRESS__: Address of the location. Only displayed if a name is present.

post.description:
This endpoint will send a Contact message to service. \ This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user. \ The "**type**" available in message parts is contact. \ To send a new message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER"and USER_WHATSAPP_PHONE has to be changed.
USER_WHATSAPP_PHONE should be with country code but without the prefix + and spaces. `Remember — the API requires authentication!` ![contact](/contact.jpg)

This endpoint will send a TextPickerSingle message to service. \ This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user. To send a new message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", "MESSAGE_BODY", "LIST_PICKER_TITLE","ITEM_TITLE","ITEM_SUBTITLE","UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER","MESSAGE_HEADER" ,"MESSAGE_FOOTER" ,
"RECEIVED_MESSAGE_TITLE" and "MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE" has to be changed.
There is a minimum of 1 and maximum of 10 sections are permitted.The body, header, footer and sections will be a stringified object. `Remember — the API requires authentication!` ![listpicker](/listpicksingle.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__LIST_PICKER_TITLE__: Title of the list picker There’s a maximum of 24 characters.
__MESSAGE_BODY__: The body of the list picker item. There’s a maximum of 1024 characters.
__MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE__: The size of the MESSAGE_BODY
__ITEM_TITLE__: The title of the list picker item
__ITEM_SUBTITLE__: The subtitle of the list picker item. Subtile is optional.
__UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER__: Unique identifier. Maximum of 200 characters
__MESSAGE_HEADER__: The header data of the list picker item. Text for the header. Maximum of 60 characters
__MESSAGE_FOOTER__: The footer data of the list picker item There’s a maximum of 60 characters.
__RECEIVED_MESSAGE_TITLE__: The title of the received message. There’s a maximum of 20 characters.

post.description:
This endpoint will send a TextPickerMultiple message to service. \ This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user. To send a new message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", "MESSAGE_BODY", "LIST_PICKER_TITLE","ITEM_TITLE","ITEM_SUBTITLE","UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER","MESSAGE_HEADER" ,
"MESSAGE_FOOTER" ,"RECEIVED_MESSAGE_TITLE" and "MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE" has to be changed. There is a minimum of 1 and maximum of 10 sections are permitted. The body, header, footer and sections will be a stringified object. `Remember — the API requires authentication!` ![listpicker](/listpickmulti.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__LIST_PICKER_TITLE__: Title of the list picker There’s a maximum of 24 characters.
__MESSAGE_BODY__: The body of the list picker item. There’s a maximum of 1024 characters.
__MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE__: The size of the MESSAGE_BODY
__ITEM_TITLE__: The title of the list picker item
__ITEM_SUBTITLE__: The subtitle of the list picker item. Subtile is optional.
__UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER__: Unique identifier. Maximum of 200 characters
__MESSAGE_HEADER__: The header data of the list picker item. Text for the header. Maximum of 60 characters
__MESSAGE_FOOTER__: The footer data of the list picker item There’s a maximum of 60 characters.
__RECEIVED_MESSAGE_TITLE__: The title of the received message. There’s a maximum of 20 characters.

post.description:
This endpoint will send a ReplyButton message to service. \ This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user. \ A maximum of 3 buttons with a character length upto 20 are supported by WhatsApp. If more than 3 buttons are added in the request payload, UnificationEngine has a unique feature of converting the buttons into a list picker for better user experience. If the button length are more than 20 characters, UnificationEngine will converted it into a numbered menu in WhatsApp. \ To send a new message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", "MESSAGE_BODY", "BUTTON_TITLE", "UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER",
"MESSAGE_HEADER" ,"MESSAGE_FOOTER" and "MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE" has to be changed. There is a minimum of 1 and maximum of 3 buttons are permitted. The body, header, footer and buttons will be a stringified object. `Remember — the API requires authentication!` ![button](/button.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__BUTTON_TITLE__: Title of the button There’s a maximum of 20 characters.
__MESSAGE_BODY__: The body of the list picker item. There’s a maximum of 1024 characters.
__MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE__: The size of the MESSAGE_BODY
__ITEM_TITLE__: The title of the list picker item
__ITEM_SUBTITLE__: The subtitle of the list picker item. Subtile is optional.
__UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER__: Unique identifier. Maximum of 256 characters
__MESSAGE_HEADER__: {"type": "text" | "image" | "video" | "document","text": "your text",OR "document": {"link": "DOCUMENT_LINK","filename": "some-file-name"}, OR"video": {"link": "VIDEO_LINK"} OR "image": {"link": "IMAGE_LINK"}}
__MESSAGE_FOOTER__: The footer data of the list picker item There’s a maximum of 60 characters.

post.description:
This endpoint will send a template message to service. 
\
This api call should be authenticated with the key and secret of the user.

To send a new template message "PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE", "UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER", "NAME_SPACE" , "ELEMENT_NAME"  , “LOCALIZABLE_PARAMS_VALUE”  and "MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE" has to be changed.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`

![template](/template.jpg)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
__PHONENUMBER_WITH_COUNTRYCODE__: The phone number to which the application has to send message
__NAME_SPACE__: A Message Template namespace is a bundle of language packs for a particular business.
__ELEMENT_NAME__: The element name that indicates which template to use within the namespace.
__LANGUAGE_CODE__: The code of the language or locale to use — Accepts both language and language_locale formats (e.g., en and en_US).
__LOCALIZABLE_PARAMS_VALUE__: This field is an array of values to apply to variables in the template
__MESSAGE_BODY_SIZE__: TThe character length of the parts->data For eg: For the below stringified json, the character length is 194. {\"namespace\": \"c616ba00_a627_e299_3118_095bbc2d5051\",\"element_name\": \"xdk_alert\",\"language\": \"en\", \"localizable_params\": [{\"default\":\"test 1\"},{\"default\":\"test 2\"}]}.

post.description:
The application has to retrieve media data using below API by providing the media id, message id, connection name, and user credentials.

The response for the above API call will be a base64 data as shown below.

`Remember — the API requires authentication!`

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__: Connection name
__MEDIA_ID__: Id of the media retrieved in the webhook
__MESSAGE_ID__: Id of the webhook message

post.description:
When users sent a message to the WABA number,  the message status won't be changed as read(blue double tick) in WhatsApp automatically.
As soon the webhook receives the message, the application has to call a UE api to change the message status as read.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
__UNIQUE_CONNECTION_IDENTIFIER__ :Connection name
MESSAGE_ID: Id of the webhook message

userAuth.description:
# User Authentication

Use **User accesskey** as *Username* and **User Secret** as *Password*
